QuestData.Title: Captive Audience
QuestData.Description: The Kirin Tor have gone too far! Now they hold our fellow Sunreavers as war prisoners!$b$bThere will be no discussion of prisoner exchange. We will handle this ourselves.$b$bGo to Violet Rise and free as many prisoners as you can. Do not get captured yourself. We cannot afford to lose you too.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 5 Sunreaver Captives around Violet Rise.
